artist: Etcher: Robert van Audenaerde; Delineator: After Carlo Maratti
description: Abraham's servant meets Rebecca at the well and offers expensive presents; points to camels
inscription:
Signature and Inscription

on sheet below image in black: [Puella, cui ego discero: inclina hydream tuam ut bibam; et illa responderit, bibe, quin et/ Camelis tuis dabo potum: ipsa est, quam preparasti servo tuo Isaac. GenCap 24 v. 14/ Car Mattatus inv er delin   Apud Jacobum Frey cum privil Summi Pont. et Regis Christ.mi  R.V. AudenAerd Sculp.]; in pencil on sheet: [Huber v6 p280 3]; [O.V]; URC: [1700]; on verso in pencil: [2-15]; LRC mount verso: [L 280]
title: Print
